entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
